## Source: ossf-package-analysis (131a72d7a509dfbdfaa80048c9ac64559b4f8ec25798e555ea15688529491856)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'jscrambler-permission-utils' @ 6.6.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
